last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: A malicious online post about Dae-o and Ae-jeong's relationship goes viral, putting the film and Dae-o's reputation in serious jeopardy.

name: Was It Love?
overview: After 14 years devoid of romance, a struggling movie producer and single mom faces the unexpected arrival of 4 men into her life—an author, an actor, a CEO, and a younger man—who might just revive her dormant desire for love.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Noh Ae-jeong juggles motherhood with her dreams of producing films. One day, her boss disappears — and leaves behind a giant mess for her to solve.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When someone Ae-jeong hasn't seen for 14 years turns up at her meeting with Cheon Eok-man, she realizes convincing him to work with her won't be easy.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Learning about Ae-jeong's dire situation throws Oh Dae-o into a dilemma. Meanwhile, Noh Ha-nee has questions for the new tenant in her house.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: After reaching an agreement, Ae-jeong and Dae-o turn their attention to casting a lead actor. Ha-nee identifies another man who could be her father.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ryu Jin shocks his agency when he turns down the opportunity of a lifetime. Ae-jeong takes on her next mission: getting a top actress for the film.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Oh Yeon-woo gives Ae-jeong a letter he's kept for years. Joo A-rin is excited to meet with Dae-o, but is let down when she sees who's with him.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: While dealing with a newly strained relationship with Ae-jeong, Dae-o runs into Ha-nee on the street. Koo Pa-do shows up to a PTA meeting at school.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: While a fissure forms in Dae-o and Jin's friendship, Ae-jeong worries about her daughter's recent interests. A-rin begins to see what's going on.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: On the island, Ae-jeong and the four men are dismayed to hear they're stuck there until the next morning. Koo Dong-chan goes into his father's study.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Ae-jeong wants to talk to Dae-o, but someone else answers the door at his place. Jin decides he's had enough of being told what to do.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The true events of what happened 14 years ago between Ae-jeong and Dae-o come to light. A-rin comes across a frustrated Jin.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A scandalous news article causes problems for Ha-nee at school and horrifies Ae-jeong, who becomes determined to put a stop to the rumors.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Jin brings Ha-nee back to where it all started for him, Dae-o and Ae-jeong. Dong-chan works up the courage to ask his father about his mother.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: While trapped in a kidnapping, Dong-chan's eyes are opened to the truth about Pa-do. A-rin drops a bomb on the film's production.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Yeon-woo and Ae-jeong share a heart-to-heart. Ha-nee crafts an unusual checklist for Dae-o. A-rin rescues Jin from an unpleasant encounter.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: A malicious online post about Dae-o and Ae-jeong's relationship goes viral, putting the film and Dae-o's reputation in serious jeopardy.
